il.ac.hit.costmanager.models

Interface IModel

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CostManagerModel

    public interface IModel
    This Interface describes CostManagerModel class, and it's methods that will work directly with the MySQL database.
    Author:
    Ziv Hochman, Anzor Torikashvili.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int addCategory(Category category, int userId)
      Adds a new category that the current user entered to the categories table in the database.
      int addCurrency(Currency currency, int userId)
      Adds new currency to the current user in the database.
      int addItem(Item item, int userId, double transactionAmount)
      Adds a new item to the database.
      int addPerson(Person person)
      Adds a new person to usersDetail table in the database.
      int deleteItem(int itemId)
      Deletes an item from the database.
      java.util.List<Category> getCategories(int userId)
      This function returns all the categories of the current user from the database.
      Category getCategory(java.lang.String categoryName, int userId)
      This function returns the category from the database by name.
      java.util.List<Currency> getCurrencies(int userId)
      This function returns the currencies of the current user from the database.
      Currency getCurrency(java.lang.String currencyName, int userId)
      This function returns the currency from the database by name.
      Item[] getItemsArrayListFromDBAccordingToPerson(int personId)
      This function returns the items that belong to the current user.
      java.util.List<Item> getItemsByDates(int personId, java.time.LocalDate firstDate, java.time.LocalDate lastDate)
      This function returns all the data between 2 given dates for the current user.
      Person getPerson(java.lang.String firstName, java.lang.String password)
      This function returns the person from usersDetails table in the database that the name and the password belongs to him.

      • addCategory

        int addCategory(Category category,
                int userId)
         throws CostManagerException
        Adds a new category that the current user entered to the categories table in the database.
        Parameters:
        category - The name of the category.
        userId - id of the user
        Returns:
        The number of rows affected by the SQL statement.
        Throws:
        CostManagerException - an exception thrown from the DB.

      • addCurrency

        int addCurrency(Currency currency,
                int userId)
         throws CostManagerException
        Adds new currency to the current user in the database.
        Parameters:
        currency - The currency we want to add.
        userId - id of the user who wants to add a new currency.
        Returns:
        The number of rows affected by the SQL statement.
        Throws:
        CostManagerException - an exception thrown from the DB.

      • addItem

        int addItem(Item item,
            int userId,
            double transactionAmount)
     throws CostManagerException
        Adds a new item to the database.
        Parameters:
        item - The data we want to INSERT into the database.
        userId - User Id.
        transactionAmount - The amount that will be deducted from the user's wallet.
        Returns:
        The number of rows affected by the SQL statement.
        Throws:
        CostManagerException - an exception thrown from the DB.

       throws CostManagerException
        Adds a new person to usersDetail table in the database.
        Parameters:
        person - The data we want to INSERT into usersDetails table.
        Returns:
        The number of rows affected by the SQL statement.
        Throws:
        CostManagerException - an exception thrown from the DB.

        throws CostManagerException
        Deletes an item from the database.
        Parameters:
        itemId - id of the item we wish to delete from the database.
        Returns:
        Returns the number of rows affected by the SQL statement.
        Throws:
        CostManagerException - an exception thrown from the DB.

                     int userId)
              throws CostManagerException

        categoryName - The name of the current category.
        userId - The id of the current user.
        Returns:
        Category or null.
        Throws:
        CostManagerException - an exception thrown from the DB.

        Returns:
        List of currency.

      • getItemsArrayListFromDBAccordingToPerson

        Item[] getItemsArrayListFromDBAccordingToPerson(int personId)
                                         throws CostManagerException
        This function returns the items that belong to the current user.
        Parameters:
        personId - id of the current user.
        Returns:
        Array of Item that includes all the items of the current user.
        Throws:
        CostManagerException - an exception thrown from the DB.

      • getItemsByDates

        java.util.List<Item> getItemsByDates(int personId,
                                     java.time.LocalDate firstDate,
                                     java.time.LocalDate lastDate)
                              throws CostManagerException
        This function returns all the data between 2 given dates for the current user.
        Parameters:
        personId - The id of the user.
        firstDate - The minimum date the items needs.
        lastDate - The maximum date that we don't want the items to go above it.
        Returns:
        Return list of items that include all the items of the current user and that are between the firsDate and lastDate.
        Throws:
        CostManagerException - an exception thrown from the DB.

      • getPerson

        Person getPerson(java.lang.String firstName,
                 java.lang.String password)
          throws CostManagerException
        This function returns the person from usersDetails table in the database that the name and the password belongs to him.
        Parameters:
        firstName - The name of the user.
        password - The password of the user.
        Returns:
        Objects type Person.
        Throws:
        CostManagerException - an exception thrown from the DB.
